index_communicative_language_teaching: * Communicative Language Teaching: State of the Art. Savignon, S. J. (1991)
index_description: Experience the magic of speaking with AI, just like how children naturally learn languages.
index_discover_a_fun_and_effective_way: Discover a fun and effective way to master a new language
index_download_corgi_and_discover_the_mo: Download Corgi and discover the most natural way to learn a language: with your voice
index_expand_your_word_bank: Expand your word bank without breaking a sweat. Say goodbye to boring word lists and hello to a fun, interactive learning experience!
index_mistakes_no_worries: Mistakes? No Worries, We’ve Got Your Back!
index_our_app_gently_corrects: Our app gently corrects your slip-ups and boosts your grammar — kind of like a friendly grammar ninja.Get instant feedback on your language blunders and watch your grammar skills soar.
index_review_1_text: Super good If I can give 100 stars I would give it. it is a nice app
index_review_2_text: Thank you so much to a team who made this such a helpful application... thanks a lot :)
index_review_3_text: Its like my best friend he is really cute
index_review_4_text: Good! I use the translate button to understand, recommended!
index_review_5_text: Thank you for this application i hope you add arabic language
index_review_6_text: Excellent finally found what I needed 5/5
index_speak_to_learn_learn_to_speak: Speak to Learn, Learn to Speak
index_studies_show_speaking_can_boost: Studies show speaking can boost your learning efficiency by up to 75%*. It's the fast track to fluency!
index_the_best_time_to_start_is_now: The Best Time to Start is NOW!
index_title: Explore the Future of AI Language Learning
index_with_corgi_you_can_role_play: Talk to unique AI personalities designed to simulate real-life conversations, providing corrections and feedback to help you progress faster than ever!
meta_index_description: Experience the magic of speaking with AI, just like how children naturally learn languages. Try it for free and see for yourself!
meta_index_title: Corgi: The Future of AI Language Learning

subscribe_description: Sometimes we have some stunning news we want to share. Don't miss it.
why_do_you_need_account_description: Well, we get it – we're not fans of signing up for stuff online either. But, alas, we had to do it to ensure your progress is saved and synced up. Without the whole registration thing, the cool features you now enjoy in Corgi wouldn't have been possible.
why_do_you_need_account_item_1_text: Your data? It's like Fort Knox – we don't share it with a soul.
why_do_you_need_account_item_2_text: Encryption is our middle name – all your info is under lock and key.
why_do_you_need_account_item_3_text: No spam! We don't hit you with marketing messages unless you've given us the green light.
